availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Beverly Winslow (Gallatin County, Kentucky, attorney)

body.p: Gallatin County, Kentucky, attorney. Kentucky native. Married to Martha Jane Woolfork Winslow. Father of Henry M. Winslow, Louisa M. Winslow, James T. Winslow, Marian S. Winslow, Jamie W. Winslow, William B. Winslow Jr., Ruth Winslow. Attorney in Carroll County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, Carrollton, p. 12.
